title: Game doesn't autostart?
body: Hey guys, just tried playing a game of ranked and everything was going fine, but once the match went to start it never opened. Just the window saying a match was in progress. I waited and eventually closed the game and tried to retry. After forever it finally opened, but then froze. I closed it again only to go to the end game screen where it said remake due to me being a leaver. It wasn't even my fault?? Is there anyway i can prevent this from happening again? Seems stupid I get penalized for something I couldn't even control.

replies.body:
After champion select ends and you go into the champion loading screen, your network needs to make a new connection to the actual game servers. It sounds like something caused that connection to be unstable, or it wasn't able to ever make the connection at all.

Try going through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up your network's connection. Let me know if you have any questions.
